projects.title: Distributed Task Queue System
projects.description: Built a high-throughput task processing system using Elixir and RabbitMQ that handles over 1M tasks per day with 99.9% uptime. Implemented fault tolerance, load balancing, and real-time monitoring.

projects.title: Real-time Analytics Platform
projects.description: Developed a real-time data analytics engine using Rust and WebAssembly for processing streaming data with sub-second latency. Features include custom aggregations, anomaly detection, and interactive dashboards.

projects.title: Microservices Orchestration Framework
projects.description: Created a lightweight microservices orchestration framework in Java that simplifies distributed transaction management and service communication. Includes circuit breakers, retries, and distributed tracing.

projects.title: Database Performance Optimizer
projects.description: Built an intelligent database query optimizer that analyzes slow queries and suggests optimizations. Reduced average query time by 40% across production databases through automated indexing and query rewriting.

projects.title: Serverless API Gateway
projects.description: Designed and implemented a serverless API gateway with TypeScript that handles authentication, rate limiting, and request routing for microservices. Supports multiple authentication providers and custom plugins.
